headline: Merck (NYSE:MRK) Faces Multiple Shareholder Proposals Ahead Of Annual Meeting
summary: Merck (NYSE:MRK) recently experienced a significant corporate governance event when multiple shareholder proposals were announced, with the company recommending against them for the upcoming annual meeting. This development comes amid a general market downturn, underscored by the Dow and Nasdaq dropping 4% and 6%, respectively. Over the past week, Merck's share price has decreased by 5.42%, slightly exceeding the broader market's decline. The combination of these shareholder proposals and...

headline: S&P, Dow Jones Pharma Names Rattled — Again — On Trump's Tariffs Whiplash
summary: Pharma stocks tumbled Thursday after the Trump administration said the delay for reciprocal tariffs doesn't apply to sector-specific tariffs.
